Keep your passwords and accounts secure across all platforms and devices.

Easily and securely keep track of all your Passwords!

AuthPass is a stand alone password manager with support for the popular and security-proven KeePass format. Store your passwords, share across all your devices and easily find them whenever you need to login.

‚Ä¢ All your passwords in one place.
‚Ä¢ Generate secure random passwords for each of your accounts.
‚Ä¢ Quick Unlock secured with biometric lock.
‚Ä¢ Keep track of your accounts across the web.
‚Ä¢ App available on all platforms. Among them Mac, iPhone and iPad.
‚Ä¢ Open multiple password files at the same time (e.g. one for work, one for personal - or even share your password files with coworkers)
‚Ä¢ Save Time-based One Time Passwords for 2fa (Two Factor Authentication).
‚Ä¢ Attach binary files to your password entries. (Like offline TANs, etc)
‚Ä¢ Open Source available on https://github.com/authpass/authpass/
‚Ä¢ Dark Theme ;-)


=== UNDER YOUR CONTRL ===

AuthPass stores all your passwords in the open Keepass format, exactly where you want it. It does not send your passwords to our servers. But AuthPass supports saving to:

‚Ä¢ Any local document provider, like iCloud.
‚Ä¢ Native Google Drive Integration
‚Ä¢ Native Dropbox Integration
‚Ä¢ Native WebDAV support to store in your own NextCloud or OwnCloud (or similar)
‚Ä¢ Native Microsoft OneDrive integration


=== FULL FEATURED, NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTION ===

As an open source project there are no artificial feature restrictions, no ads and no requirement for payments.

Contributions welcome and encouraged :-) (Always looking for developers, translators, documentation writers, UI designer, etc. :) ), just join our discord channel: https://authpass.app/go/discord.


=== UNDER ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT ===

This is an open source project which is still under heavy development, adding features. We would love your feedback via email or on the issue tracker at: https://github.com/authpass/authpass/issues/

Also join the community on our discord channel at https://authpass.app/go/discord
column3: apple-appstore-description --- see my comment, this is essentially the same as the playstore_full_description just slight modifications for apple.
apple-appstore-keywords - Keywords used for searching in the apple app store. Does not have to be a 1:1 translation, choose keywords that mak sense.
